descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
This is a football header and freekick simulator (soccer).

The game is a must-play for football fans and is easy to play, whether you're new to VR or a seasoned VR player.

Become a pro player who scores headers and freekicks in a football simulator. 

# CHALLENGING DEFENDERS AI

The defenders and goalkeepers in this game will try their best to stop you from scoring. You have to quickly assert their positions and decide where to put the ball to maximize scoring chance (as in real life).

# REALISTIC BALL PHYSICS
We developed our projectile physics to correctly simulate the ball projectile with drag, Magnus effect, and collision check with your head to ensure a realistic heading experience.

# NEVER PLAYED FOOTBALL IRL? WE GOT YOU COVERED!

We have slow-motion options so heading becomes easy for new players! We have also prepared a tutorial section to teach you the technique in our training facility!



# REALISTIC GOAL-NET PHYSICS

The game is in Early Access and we would love to hear your feedback! Join us on Discord now https://discord.gg/Xyp2SyyKXv
